gpt_scene_description_list: On a city road, the weather is clear, a white car (car_10) is driving, located on the right side of the road.
The ego-vehicle is following closely behind.
In front of the white car (car_10) is a black car (car_7).
A black car (car_7) is following another white car (car_8).
On the left side of the road, there is a traffic sign with a speed limit of 40 km/h and a no parking sign.
On the right side of the road, near the traffic light, a black car (car_12) is passing by.
Meanwhile, a white car (car_11) is coming from the left side of the road.
A red car (car_13) is also passing from the left side.
The overall traffic condition shows that vehicles are driving in an orderly manner, with moderate traffic flow.
The ego-vehicle is preparing to cross the zebra crossing, while other vehicles on the road are following traffic rules and driving orderly.
